description: This is a test suite for the NotesService module, specifically testing functions normalizeTags and searchNotes. It imports specific functions from NotesService and contains unit tests to verify their behavior with various inputs.

methods.name: normalizeTags
methods.description: Function that normalizes a list of tags by converting to lowercase, trimming whitespace, and removing duplicates.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Function that filters notes based on a search query and tags, returning matching notes.
